name: Animal Crossing New Horizons - Map Components
description:
This File lets you explore new layouts for your town in Animal Crossing: New Horizons. 

1. Capture the map screen for your town on the Switch
2. Copy it to your computer (SD, Twitter, or FB post)
3. Select the “Background Map → MAP_IMAGE ”
    layer and replace the image.
4. Place the town building components on it!

• The map will be 1sq : 1px.
• Components are sized for the footprints of the buildings
• Dotted lines show building space boundaries.
